com.samsung.multiscreen.Channel.OnMessageListener

    • Uses of Channel.OnMessageListener in com.samsung.multiscreen

      Methods in com.samsung.multiscreen with parameters of type Channel.OnMessageListener 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Channel.addOnMessageListener(String event, Channel.OnMessageListener onMessageListener)
      Add a listener for messages on the specified channel.
      void Channel.removeOnMessageListener(String event, Channel.OnMessageListener onMessageListener)
      Remove the specified message listener subscribed to the event on this channel.
